Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 6.3 with a standard deviation 2.5. The z-score of the person with 10 right is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.07
* 1.48
* 2.84

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.07: Incorrect
* 1.48: Correct
* 2.84: Incorrect
